data.name: Strikers
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to the exciting smash-up of MOBA and Soccer!

STRIKERS is a fun and exciting ball game with MOBA controls that breaks all the rules using characters with powerful abilities. BLINK across the field, POISON your opponents, CRUSH the goalie, and SCORE the winning kick! Play the character that suits your strategy (offense, defense, mid-field) and then save your mana for the right time to strike. Everyone can complete an important role in the team to score points and raise your standing within the league!

STRIKERS is full of great multiplayer features...

  • A variety of Characters with standard abilities like kick, sprint, and tackle in addition to their own exclusive abilities - with new characters planned!
  • An easy Quickmatch system that brings players of similar ability together into teams
  • Replay Mode to watch other teams, learn techniques, and show off your own skills to others
  • Observer Mode to make streaming easy and fun on services like Twitch and YouTube
  • Detailed statistics for each player tracked and shown after each match
  • International Leaderboards to rank yourself and your team against the rest of the world
  • Practice mode allows you to train against a set of bots to hone your skills before getting online

It's so easy to learn to play because you already know the game of Soccer. Get in and start playing today!

data.short_description: STRIKERS is a fun and exciting game that mixes MOBA controls and the Soccer playbook using characters with powerful abilities.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Czech, Dutch, Greek, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Italian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista SP2
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTS 250 or ATI Radeon HD 3870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz+ Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 550 Ti or AMD Radeon HD 6800 Series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
